text: Five species within the genus Leishmania have been identified in cats : Leishmania mexicana , Leishmania venezuelensis , Leishmania braziliensis and Leishmania amazonensis in the New World , and Leishmania infantum in both the New and Old Worlds ( Table 1 ) . We can therefore state that cats are likely to be infected by the same Leishmania species found in humans or other animals in the same geographic area .
